thread.title: Large fall in Great Western Railway complaints
thread.title_full: Large fall in Great Western Railway complaints | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Large fall in Great Western Railway complaints
text:
A large fall in complaints for Great Western Railway Credit: ITV Complaints about rail services have seen the biggest drop in the country on Great Western Railway, but a big rise on Chiltern.
Great Western Railway saw a 31 per cent reduction according to regulator, the Office For Road and Rail for the last three months.
It follows an improvement in trains on time after a series of engineering work overruns and signal problems between Reading and London earlier in the year.
Last updated Fri 9 Oct 2015 Travel First Great Western
